text: Ayinum, appenkalait tintuvatarku mun - anal mahar niccayitta pin ninkal talak colvirkalayin, ninkal kurippattirunta mahar tokaiyil pati(avarkalukku) untu- appenkalo allatu evar kaiyil (at)tirumanam parriya piti irukkarato avarkalo mulumaiyum) mannittu vittalanri; - anal, (ivvisayattil) vittuk kotuppatu takvavukku (payapaktikku) mikka nerukkamanatakum; innum, unkalukkitaiye (oruvarukkoruvar) upakaram ceytu kolvataiyum maravatirkal - niccayamaka allah ninkal ceyvatai par(ttuk kuli kotu)ppavanaka irukkinran
